Others: Croatia face Poland in a UEFA Nations League clash at the Opus Arena, Osijek.
Both teams are eager to make a mark in this competitive group, with Croatia looking to recover from a tough opening defeat against Portugal.
Poland, on the other hand, head into the match buoyed by a thrilling 3-2 victory over Scotland.
The best betting value for this encounter lies in backing Poland to avoid defeat, with a draw or an away win emerging as the most plausible outcomes.
